name: An Explosive Day (Game Jam)
description:
Good morning deminer !

Oh no, apparently you didn't have enough time to demine this bomb 💣 ! Quick, you have to search and find a place where you can blow it up without killing anybody !

Controls 🎮 :

W/A/S/D or Z/Q/S/D : move

SPACE : manually detonate the bomb

The Team 😎 :

  • Valentin Barrère (Prog, GigaQueue) EtriZe
  • Mathieu Bocciarelli (Prog)
  • Manon Bert (Art, GameDesign) Artstation
  • Paul Cochard (Art)
  • Arthur Mallet (Art) Artwave, Artstation
  • Enzo Ducos (Art) MrGratin, Artstation

Project made in 48H for the "don't kill anything" Game Jam at Ynov Bordeaux

We didn't have time for sound but it may come in a next update (maybe)

The game may take a little time and freeze when clicking play but don't worry you just have to wait a little and it'll start :)
